description: The information about restriction level on a restrict-able object.

objectId.description: The id of the restrictable object

restrictionLevel.description: Restriction level on a restrict-able object.

hasUnmetAccessRequirement.description: True if user has at least one unmet access requirement on this restrict-able object; false otherwise.

isUserDataContributor.description: True if the user is considered a data contributor, e.g. has update and delete permissions on the data. Applies only to ENTITY restrictable objects.

userHasDownloadPermission.description: True if the user has download permission on the data. Applies only to ENTITY restrictable objects.

restrictionDetails.description: The list of restriction fulfillment information for each access requirement that applies to the restrictable object.
